evaluation_prompt:
Evaluate the response based on the following criteria:
1. Theme Analysis: Depth and insight in analyzing key themes
2. Literary Analysis: Discussion of literary devices and techniques
3. Textual Support: Use of specific examples from the text
4. Coherence: Logical organization and clear expression of ideas

theme_analysis.description: Depth and insight in analyzing key themes

literary_analysis.description: Discussion of literary devices and techniques

textual_support.description: Use of specific examples from the text to support analysis

coherence.description: Logical organization and clear expression of ideas

metadata.notes: General rubric for literary analysis, adaptable for various texts
